appearances.title: U.S. House of Representatives U.S. House of Representatives : CSPAN : January 13, 2026 4:31pm-9:30pm EST
appearances.snippet: johnson excused violence against ice, as people quote, channeling that frustration, representative laura friedmansaid ice officers are, quote, terrorizing our friends and neighbors and bringing chaos and violence to our streets. i've got dozens more of these that i could continue to fill time on the house floor, going through the absolute vitriolic attacks on the people of ice. literally another 30 in the list that i could read off. that is what is occurring on a daily basis, being directed at the people of ice. now, i want to give you a tale of two choices. i want you to look at and make a decision here about who you want to focus on. over here we have victims of dangerous illegal aliens that were in the united states of america. over here, we have five americans who are no longer with us. we have kayla hamilton, a 20 year old woman with autism living in aberdeen, maryland, who was savagely strangled to death by an illegal alien. ms. 13 gang member released by biden at the border. we have sergeant brandon mendoza, a 13 year mesa police department veteran who was struck by a previouslyconvis drun
